name: KWIC Walk-In Clinic - Kitchener Walk-In Clinic
comment:
Walk-in medical clinic * doctors and nurses assess and treat minor illnesses and injuries

Service include:
  • general health consultations
  • preventive care
  • vaccinations
  • sexually transmitted infections and urinary tract infections testing
  • sick notes
  • flu and allergy shots
  • driver’s medicals
  • work and travel exams
  • wart removal
  • pregnancy testing
  • specialist referrals

KWIC Walk-In Clinic - Kitchener Walk-In Clinic

Walk-in medical clinic * doctors and nurses assess and treat minor illnesses and injuries<br><br><b>Service include:</b><ul><li>general health consultations</li><li>preventive care</li><li>vaccinations</li><li>sexually transmitted infections and urinary tract infections testing</li><li>sick notes</li><li>flu and allergy shots</li><li>driver’s medicals</li><li>work and travel exams</li><li>wart removal</li><li>pregnancy testing</li><li>specialist referrals</li></ul>

Location/fb929d68-2add-411b-95bb-5a65172008eb
